title: Final NBA MVP Straw Poll Results
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk the final NBA MVP straw poll results including reacting to a new leader at the top before talking seeding in the Eastern Conference and the Suns’ dominance.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
